message:
Hi Stephen, thanks for your shared.

I have a question, when I ran api, this method return contents: 

StatusCode: 200, ReasonPhrase: 'OK', Version: 1.1, Content: System.Net.Http.PushStreamContent, Headers: { Content-Type: application/octet-stream Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=MyZipfile.zip }

But I don't know, how to client can download this file. I using .NET Framework 4.8 and Jquery.
Hope you reply soon.
